title: Fix deployment compilation errors and publish to production

requirements.text: Analyze and fix all Motoko compilation errors in backend/main.mo that are preventing successful deployment to the Internet Computer production network

quotes: Publish my project and provide a permanent public link

acceptanceCriteria: Backend/main.mo compiles without errors using the current Motoko compiler
All type declarations and function signatures are valid
Deployment to Internet Computer production network succeeds

requirements.text: Verify all HashMap operations and stable storage patterns in backend/main.mo use correct syntax compatible with the Motoko compiler version
acceptanceCriteria: All stable variable declarations are syntactically correct
HashMap initialization and operations use proper Motoko syntax
Pre-upgrade and post-upgrade patterns are valid if present

requirements.text: Ensure all module imports in backend/main.mo reference valid Motoko base library modules with correct paths
acceptanceCriteria: All import statements use correct module paths
All imported modules exist in the Motoko base library
No missing or deprecated module references

requirements.text: Deploy the fixed backend canister to Internet Computer production network and verify it receives a permanent canister ID

quotes: provide a permanent public link that I can access anytime

acceptanceCriteria: Backend canister deploys successfully to production network
Canister receives a permanent canister ID
Backend functions are accessible via production canister

requirements.text: Deploy the frontend to Internet Computer production network and generate a permanent public .ic0.app URL that works on mobile and laptop devices

quotes: Ensure the link works on mobile and laptop

acceptanceCriteria: Frontend deploys successfully to production network
Application receives a permanent .ic0.app URL (format: https://xxxxx-xxxxx-xxxxx-xxxxx-xxx.ic0.app)
URL is publicly accessible without authentication
Application is fully functional on mobile devices
Application is fully functional on laptop/desktop devices

requirements.text: Verify the production deployment persists and remains accessible 24/7 without requiring platform login

quotes: access anytime without logging into the platform

acceptanceCriteria: Production URL remains accessible after deployment completes
No platform authentication required to view the live application
Application maintains uptime on Internet Computer network
All 8 feature modules are functional in production

constraints: Must respect single-actor architecture in backend/main.mo
Must not modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts or other immutable frontend paths
Must use Motoko for backend - no other languages supported
Deployment must target Internet Computer production network, not local replica
nonGoals: Changing the UI design or styling
